alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. John The Baptist, east central Ascension, southeastern Livingston and southeastern Tangipahoa Parishes through 800 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Whitehall, or 13 miles northwest of Reserve, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitehall, Killian and W Lk Pontchartrain Buoy. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 6 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. John The Baptist
